T=input();
for t in range(T) :
       N=input();
       s=raw_input();
       a=s.split(' ');
       for i in range(N) :
           a[i]=int(a[i]);
       a.sort();
       b=a[::-1];
       total=0;
       avg=0;
       for i in range(N) :
           total=total+b[i];
           if (total/float(i+1))>avg :
                 avg=total/float(i+1);
       print avg;
